sentences.sentence: This model can describe the effect of backwash and time-varying influent conditions on biofilters.
sentences.translation: 该模型能动态描述进水及反冲洗过程对生物滤池状态和处理效果的影响。

sentences.sentence: Sludge reduction performance by earthworm biofilters using quartz sand and ceramsite as media was compared.
sentences.translation: 比较了石英砂和陶粒滤料蚯蚓生物滤池的污泥减量化效果。
